meanings.definition: A person or entity that republishes content.
meanings.sent1: The republisher shared the article on their website.
meanings.sent2: The republisher reposted the video on social media.
meanings.sent3: The republisher accidentally published the same news twice.
meanings.sent4: She became a republisher of knowledge, spreading information far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The diligent republisher ensured that the information reached a larger audience.

meanings.sent1: He will republisher the blog post tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She republishers old photos on her blog regularly.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the student to republisher his homework for a better grade.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to republisher his first album with new tracks.
meanings.sent5: The company plans to republisher the report with updated data next month.
